channel.title: Our Services on Marie Pense Center
channel.description: Recent content in Our Services on Marie Pense Center

item.title: EIP
item.description: About Service Approved as an Early Intervention Provider (EIP) through the Department of Health MPC is approved to provide services to infants up to age three in NYC, Nassau & Suffolk Counties.

item.title: ABA
item.description: About Service Applied Behavior Analysis(ABA) is the process of systematically applying interventions based upon the principles of learning theory.

item.title: SETSS
item.description: About Service All students with disabilities who require special education services have Individualized Education Programs (IEPs).
